1.content: Today was going to be an ordinary day. The gym is full with other gymnast and the trainer was blowing his top as usual yelling at anyone that make even make one mistake. Before we go any further, who are you?
1.title: Chapter 1: Gender

11.content:
You are a male gymnast. What is your name?

Ryan- 17, strong fit body, alway strive to be perfect in his technique but can be quite cocky sometimes.

Brian- 23, Slim body, friendly, funny person that everyone wants to hang around with.

Richard- 29, Slim body, Mainly keeps to himself while training.
11.title: Male

choices: Try to see who it is to get help
111.content:
Ryan was a well fit 17 year old gymnast. HIs six pack abs and charming face is what makes all the girls go gaga over him. Ryan is one of the best on the gynmastics team at his high school, but he can sometimes boast about himself about it. Some the men alway like his cockiness and some get mighty piss about Ryan always saying that he was best and he can take on all of his teammate. Ryan's dream in life is to become to be part of the Olympic and become the best gymnast in the US. He determined to achieve this dream and nothing is going to get in his way.


One day after practice, Ryan headed to the locker room and take a shower and go home. Their was no one in the locker room since Ryan took an extra hour of practice while everyone went home. He went to his locker to get his soap and towel. When he got to his locker, he started to feel weird. His clothes were getting baggier and the locker room was getting bigger. By time he reached his locker, he was already smaller than a mouse. He was totally naked since he outgrew his clothes. He couldn't believe he shrunk. Then suddnely he heard footsteps as loud as an earthquake. Ryan....
111.title: Ryan

1112.content: Ryan was relieved that someone else is in the locker room , yet he was afraid of who was it. He looked to see and it was....
1112.title: Try to see who it is to get help

11121.content:
Luke went to the locker room becuase he forgot his wallet in his locker. He and Ryan had been friends ever since they were freshmen in high school. Not as cocky as his friend, Luke still always achieve to be as good as ryan.

Ryan seen his giant friend and Luke and was relieved. Ryan thought his best friend will help save the day and figure how to return back to normal. He called up to Luke and....
11121.title: His friend Luke

111212.content: Luke could not hear Ryan weak tiny voice. Ryan moved out of the way to avoid Luke giant feet. Ryan had to get Luke's attention, so Ryan...
111212.title: Luke did not hear him

1112122.content:
Ryan thought that climbing on Luke's shoes and legs would be dangerous, so he did the next best which was getting in Luke's backpack that was sitting on the floor. Ryan ran toward the backpack and ran for the small open pocket on the side of Luke's backpack. Once Ryan was totally in there, he just waited until Luke close of that part and left for home.

Sure enough, Luke closed that side pocket halfway and left to go his...
1112122.title: Climbed in Luke's Backpack

12.content:
You are a female gymnast. What is your name?

Laura- 17, Curvy body, Determined to win no matter whose toes she step on.

Karla- 23, Slim body, Has a great personiality and is very flexible

Carly- 29, very fit, mainly keeps to herself while practicing
12.title: Female

choices: Laura is alone in the locker room?
121.content:
At seventeen years of age, Laura Jones has nearly everything that a teenage girl could possibly want, and she is an incredibly beautiful young woman as well. She has a slender, well-defined body with curvy hips, and perky D size breasts that are natural by the way. She also has smooth fair skin, and strikingly attractive green eyes. Her face is extremely lovely too, and she stands 5’6. She has a fantastic ass, and her legs are muscular. She is extremely intelligent, but can be a bit ditzy sometimes. She is also in line for a spot on the United States Woman’s Olympic team, and she will stop at nothing to get that position. Normally, when Laura is not in any competition, she is an extremely nice person, but when something like the Olympics comes around, it is on like Donkey Kong. She becomes a ruthless super villain that nearly everybody hates, but still lust after.

On this day, Laura has just gotten her uniform on, and is about to start her practice section. As she stands in the empty women’s locker-room, she hears something outside and decides to check it out. She opens the door of the locker-room and sees her cute boyfriend, Seventeen-year-old David Donald arguing with somebody. David stands six feet tall and is a gymnast as well. He has short brown hair, baby blue eyes, and lightly tanned skin, with a great ass. He has a lean, well-defined, muscular body, with no facial hair, or body hair on it. They have been dating for well over two years now, and they have similar personalities. He is normally a nice person, until a competition like the Olympics gets in his way. Then he turns into a super jerk, because he too is competing for a spot on the coveted United States Man’s Olympic team. He is dressed in his gymnastic uniform too, as he continues argues with some crazy old looking person.

She watches the old person raises his hand to David’s face and blows magical powder all over David and Laura. The old man then left but the shrinking powder is all over the couple. A few minutes later…
121.title: Laura will Shrink!

info.brief_description: After a rigorous practice section, a gymnast suddenly shrinks in the locker room.
info.description:
A gymnast is finish practicing after a rough hour of gymnastics. Once the gymast gets to the locker room, they suddenly shrink to a mere inch.

In this story anything goes. The only rule is to not let the main character die.
